translation.en: Ready or not, here I come.

translation.en: You know, I really wanna frame a good one for his birthday.

translation.en: That's really nice of you. Wow, that's such a nice thought.

translation.en: Yeah, I'll have a look at the old....

translation.en: Eat it! Eat it! Eat it!
Eat it! Eat it! Eat it!
Eat your vegetables, Gordon. Come on!
No, I'm not gonna take a picture of it. Put him down, man.

translation.en: Get up! Come on! Come on! Get up!

希望你完成了你的作业 上次你令我...

translation.en: -Okay, move. -No, how about we go to class?
I thought that was great what you did.
It was stupid, but it was great.

translation.en: You should go to the nurse. You might have a concussion.

I'd still go to the nurse though.

不是吧？意大利面和肉丸

translation.en: I'm all right. Just-- I fell, skating.

translation.en: ...think about leaving that filthy box in my kitchen.

这些是我打保龄球赢的奖杯

That's the only thing that makes any sense.
No, not tonight. I'll go by the hardware store tomorrow.

translation.en: Come on. I know a right cross when I see one.
Yes or no? Do I have to call somebody's father?

I pity the poor kid who'd have to suffer her wrath.

translation.en: And guess who sold it to him.
He asked you to keep this safe? There's nothing in here.

There's something your mom and I have to do.

translation.en: What I'm trying to say is...
...I know it's been rough for you without your dad.

translation.en: And I know we don't talk much about them.

I wish I could change it, but I can't.

translation.en: They worked together for years and they were close.

translation.en: But after that night, we never saw him again.

translation.en: I don't know. I'm here to see Dr. Connors.

translation.en: Right. You'll find yourself to the left.

translation.en: You are here for the internship?
You'll find your badge to the left.

translation.en: -Having trouble finding yourself? -No. Yeah, I got it.

translation.en: Born from the mind of our founder, Norman Osborn...

translation.en: ...the Oscorp Tower houses 108 floors of innovation.

translation.en: Our scientific minds are pushing the boundaries of defense, biomedical...

translation.en: ...and chemical technologies. The future lies within.

也是康纳斯博士的首席实习生

translation.en: Just tell them Rodrigo Guevara is here!

translation.en: That's reptiles, for those of you who don't know.

惊恐地看着自己的身体 慢慢地不听使唤或是得了视网膜黄斑变性的病人
慢慢地不听使唤或是得了视网膜黄斑变性的病人

我想到的方案更为彻底
患上帕金森氏症的原因是

你确定吗？ 我很确定

translation.en: If you'd like to gather round.
Welcome to Oscorp's tree of life.

在奥斯公司 -跨物种部门...-你好

translation.en: ...we endeavor to explore exciting new methods....
translation.zh: 我们努力探索各种新的方法...

translation.en: I was gonna say I work here...
translation.zh: 我本来想说我在这里工作

translation.en: ...but it seems like you do work here. So you know that I don't.
translation.zh: 但是你在这里工作所以你知道我不在这里工作

translation.en: -You following me? -No, I'm not following you, no.

translation.en: -I had no idea you worked here. -Why would you be here?
translation.zh: 没有，我没有跟踪你我不知道你在这里工作 那你怎么会在这里？
-你热爱科学-我对它充满热情

translation.en: -I have to lead this tour group. -I know.

translation.en: I'll ask you more about this later. Do not get me in trouble.

-这是预料之中的事-预料之中？

translation.en: We are close, but it's gonna take time.
Norman Osborn is dying, Dr. Connors.

translation.en: Or we'll both lose our heads.
All right, give me the badge.
Disgusting. Now I smell like beer.

translation.en: I didn't mean to do that.

translation.zh: 你在开玩笑吗？ 对不起

translation.en: No, man, no. Not my board.

translation.en: Next and final stop, Coney Island.

translation.en: This beats all other meat loafs.

translation.en: He took the frozen macaroni and cheese.
translation.zh: 他把冰冻的乳酪通心粉拿走了

translation.en: Why didn't you tell me you didn't like my meat loaf?

translation.en: You could have said that to me 37 years ago.
How many meat loafs have I made for you?
translation.zh: 我给你做了多少烤肉饼？

translation.en: -You don't remember me. I-- -The intern from the other day.
translation.zh: 你也许不记得我了，我是... 那天的那个实习生

translation.en: I'm sure you're very nice, but this is a home.

translation.en: I ask you to make an appointment with my office.
translation.zh: 你要见我就跟办公室预约
我是理查德·帕克的儿子

translation.en: I'm afraid I can't help you much.
I don't know why they left or where they were going.
translation.zh: 我帮不了你我不知道他们为什么离开 以及他们去了哪里
-跨物种基因移植真的有可能吗？-当然有可能

translation.en: Your father and I were mocked for our theories.
translation.zh: 你父亲和我因为我们的理论而被嘲笑了多年

translation.en: Not just in the community at large, but at Oscorp, as well.
translation.zh: 不仅是在整个社会上在奥斯公司也是如此
他们称我们是疯子科学家

translation.en: And then your father bred the spiders...
translation.zh: 后来你的父亲培育了那些蜘蛛

translation.en: We were gonna change the lives of millions.
translation.zh: 我们即将改变数百万人的生命

translation.en: And I knew without him, I....
So I stayed away from you...
And for that, I'm truly sorry.
Say you got it to work.
Like, how much would the foreign species take over?
translation.zh: 那么外来物种基因会占多大的比例？

translation.en: What could the side effects be?
It's hard to say, considering no subject survived.
translation.zh: 这很难说因为没有实验对象活下来

translation.en: How did you come up with this?
Peter, how about coming to see me at the Tower...
Number one, Reggie. Run it, buddy.
translation.zh: 一号，雷吉 跑起来，伙计

translation.en: You did that on purpose, Flash!
I should've. You better watch your back.
translation.zh: 不是，但是我应该那样你最好小心点

translation.en: -Come on, man. -Why don't you take it from me?

-快点，弗莱希-弗莱希，别玩了，伙计

translation.en: All right, bring it! Come on, Parker! Come on!

translation.en: -Peter's behavior is just unacceptable. -They won't make us pay...

translation.en: -...for the backboard. -I don't care about the backboard.
What I heard in there just now.

translation.zh: 你让那个男孩丢脸了吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Is he the kid that hit you?
translation.zh: -那是他活该-是吗？ -是的-他就是打你的那个孩子吗？

translation.en: So all this is about getting even.
If so, I guess you must feel pretty good about yourself now, right?

translation.en: Well, thanks to this little escapade of yours...
translation.zh: 由于你的这种愚蠢行为

translation.en: ...I had to change shifts at work...
...so you have to pick up Aunt May tonight at 9 o'clock. Understood?

她是你电脑上的那个女孩
是的 他的电脑上有你的照片我是他的假释官
他的电脑上有你的照片我是他的假释官

translation.en: He's a pathological liar. He thought you were someone else.
translation.zh: 他习惯撒谎 他把你当成了其他人

translation.en: Oh, man, you don't have me on your computer?
translation.zh: 天啊，你的电脑上没我的照片？

translation.en: I took a photo of the debate team, and you're in the debate team.
translation.zh: 我拍了一张辩论队的照片而你在辩论队里

translation.en: ...he must have seen-- I was touching up stuff.
translation.zh: 他肯定是看到了我当时在给照片润色

translation.en: I was.... I'm not gonna answer that.
I didn't get expelled. I got community service.
translation.zh: 我没有被开除，我要做社区服务

translation.en: So you want to-- I don't know...?

translation.zh: 想干什么？ 我也不知道

translation.en: We could do something else, or we could--
translation.zh: 我们可以干点别的或者...

translation.en: -If you don't feel like, we could-- -Yeah.
Okay. All right, good. Sounds good.
translation.zh: 好的 好的，不错，听起来不错

translation.en: -I can't right now, I can't right now. -Yeah, no.
-I'm so busy right now. -I know, me too.
translation.zh: -我现在非常忙-我知道，我也是
我们有蛋白质结构和核糖体DNA

translation.en: ...that's X-ray video. That's the only one on the planet. We have....
translation.zh: 那是X射线摄影机世上仅此一台，我们还有...
-人类生命线测试，它在...-我记得那个

translation.en: Yeah, I remember a picture of that in my dad's office.
translation.zh: 我记得我爸爸的办公室里有它的照片

translation.en: The idea was so simple. You load it with an antigen.
translation.zh: 想法非常简单，你给它装满抗原

translation.en: It creates a cloud which can be dispersed over a neighborhood, even a city.
translation.zh: 它会形成一片云，它可以覆盖一条街区甚至一座城市

translation.en: Theoretically, you could cure polio in an afternoon.
translation.zh: 理论上，你能一个下午治好小儿麻痹症

translation.en: Well, others disagreed. What if the device were loaded with a toxin?
translation.zh: 其他人有不同意见万一它装满了毒素

translation.en: What if you wanted to opt out?
You can't run away from a cloud after all, so here it lies, gathering dust.
translation.zh: 万一有人不想参与 影响范围太大所以它就被搁置在这里

translation.en: What you see here is a computer model of a lizard.
translation.zh: 你现在看到的是蜥蜴的电脑模型

translation.en: Many of these wonderful creatures have so brilliantly adapted...
translation.zh: 现在有不少这样的神奇生物

translation.en: ...that they can regenerate entire limbs at will.
translation.zh: 它们已经进化到能任意地让四肢再生
你可以想象我有多妒忌

translation.zh: 我们在尝试获取这能力

translation.en: ...and transfer it into our host subject:

translation.zh: 弗雷迪身上它是一只三条腿的老鼠
系统准备... 基因输入

translation.en: See what I'm trying to do?
-Come on, come on, come on. -Pending. Failed.
Meet Fred and Wilma, our three-legged mice.

translation.en: Okay. Careful, don't want to stick you by mistake.
translation.zh: 好的 小心点，可不想扎到你

translation.en: Human trials aren't until next week.
Now, don't answer that, but I'm glad to know it's working.
translation.zh: 别接，不过我很高兴它还能用

translation.en: You owe your aunt an apology bigtime.

translation.en: Be a man. Get in there and apologize.

translation.en: Honestly, you don't have to apologize to me. It's your--
translation.zh: 老实说，你不用 向我道歉，你的...

translation.en: Look, I'm sorry, I got distracted.
translation.zh: 听着，非常抱歉其他事情让我分心了

translation.en: Your aunt, my wife, had to walk 12 blocks alone...

translation.en: ...in the middle of the night and then wait in a deserted subway station...
translation.zh: 然后在一个偏僻的地铁站等车
就因为你分心了 本，亲爱的，老实说

translation.en: ...I am completely capable of walking home--
translation.zh: 我完全能够自己走回家

translation.en: You will not defend this boy!
You're a lot like your father.
You really are, Peter, and that's a good thing...
...but your father lived by a philosophy, a principle, really.
translation.zh: 但你父亲是个有信念，有原则的人

translation.en: He believed that if you could do good things for other people...
translation.zh: 他认为如果你能够为他人做善事

translation.en: ...you had a moral obligation to do those things.
translation.zh: 你就有道德职责去做那些事情

translation.en: That's all well and good. So where is he?
translation.zh: 说得非常好听，那他在哪里？

translation.en: He didn't think it was his responsibility to be here to tell me himself?
translation.zh: 他不觉得亲口把这些话告诉我是他的责任吗？

translation.en: Oh, come on, how dare you?
How dare I? How dare you?
translation.zh: 我竟敢这样说？是你怎么敢这样说？

translation.en: Ben, leave him alone for a little while. He'll be all right.
translation.zh: 本，让他一个人待一会吧他会没事的

translation.en: Yeah, you're holding up the line. No.
translation.zh: 后面还有人等着结帐，不行

translation.en: You can leave a penny, you can't take a penny.
translation.zh: 你可以留下一美分但是你不能拿走一美分

translation.en: ...a penny anytime, you have to spend 10 dollars...
translation.zh: 放零钱进去你要花10美元

translation.en: ...to take a penny. It's store policy.
translation.zh: 才能拿走一美分，商店规定

translation.en: -You're holding up my line. -I don't have 2 cents.
translation.zh: -你要付钱吗？别人等着结帐-我没有两美分

translation.en: You can't afford milk, step aside.
translation.zh: 没钱买牛奶就站到一边

translation.en: Daddy didn't give you enough milk money today?
translation.zh: 爸爸今天没有给够牛奶钱吗？

translation.en: Someone call an ambulance! Uncle Ben, Uncle Ben.
translation.zh: 谁快点叫救护车来，本叔叔

translation.en: Witnesses gave a description to the sketch artist. I need you to take a look.
translation.zh: 目击者向素描家描述了凶手我需要你辨认一下

translation.en: I didn't expect you would, ma'am. Homicide detectives are on it.
translation.zh: 我也不指望你认识他，夫人刑警

translation.en: We'll see what they turn up.
translation.zh: 正在调查此案我们看看他们有什么发现

translation.en: There's one other thing. He has a star...
translation.zh: 还有一件事，他左手 有个

translation.en: Peter, I know things have been difficult lately...
translation.zh: 彼得，我知道最近很不如意

translation.en: I think I know what you're feeling.
-Not today. -Come on, I just want to talk.
translation.zh: -今天不行-别这样，我只想跟你谈谈

translation.en: You like beating on old men?
-You're in the wrong place. -When were you in Queens?
translation.zh: -你跑错地方了-你上次到皇后区是什么时候？
尼基，别这样 这是枪吗？

translation.en: Get back here, man! Get him!

translation.zh: 他在那里 他逃不了

translation.en: He has a star tattooed on his left hand.
translation.zh: 他左手有个星星的纹身

translation.en: I know what you look like!

translation.zh: 通过基因增强的蜘蛛制造而成
奥斯生物线的拉伸强度无与伦比我们才刚刚开始了解

translation.en: We're just beginning to understand all the potential industrial applications.
translation.zh: 奥斯生物线的拉伸强度无与伦比我们才刚刚开始了解 其潜在的工业应用价值

translation.en: A single pellet can safely store several hundred meters...
translation.zh: 一个小球就能安全地储存上百米

translation.en: Attention, all units in the confines of Precinct 13, receiving a 10-30...
translation.zh: 十三号辖区附近的警员注意我们接到一起抢劫报案
地点是西十九街和百老汇街路口

translation.en: Last seen on foot heading eastbound on 19th Street.
Well, no, he wears a mask.
...are suspects with serious rap sheets. They're calling him a vigilante.
translation.zh: 都是案底很厚的嫌犯人们都称他为义务警员

translation.en: Okay, he's not a vigilante, he's an anarchist.
translation.zh: 他不是义务警员他是无政府主义者
所有东西 都是氨纶

translation.en: Extraordinary velocity vector is a function...
translation.zh: 这家伙巨大的速度矢量
是质量和加速度的共同作用

translation.en: Come on, you know better than anyone...
translation.zh: 拜托，你比任何人都清楚

translation.en: ...the weight on any pendulum has no effect on speed.
translation.zh: 摆锤的重量对摇摆速度没有影响

translation.en: It doesn't affect frequency, but it's totally a factor in momentum.
translation.zh: 的确不会影响频率可是会影响动量

translation.en: In the future, if you're gonna steal cars...
...don't dress like a car thief, man.
translation.zh: 别穿得像个偷车贼，伙计

translation.en: What are you? You a cop?
Really? You seriously think I'm a cop? Cop in a skin-tight red-and-blue suit?
translation.zh: 是吗？你觉得我是警察？穿着红蓝色紧身衣的警察？

translation.en: I was going more for the guys who do the luge.
translation.zh: 你要说我像滑雪运动员也就算了

translation.en: There you go. You got it.
-Just let me go. -Is that a real knife?
-My weakness, it's small knives. -Just let me go.
translation.zh: 这是我的弱点，小刀 -让我走-怎么样都可以

translation.en: Anything but knives! Oh, it's so simple.
translation.zh: -让我走-怎么样都可以 别玩刀，这太容易了
我自己发明的蛛丝你可能不会想知道

translation.en: -I don't think you want to know. -Let me go!
translation.zh: 我自己发明的蛛丝你可能不会想知道 放开我

translation.en: Okay, one second. Hold on, one second.
Come on, let me go. Stop it!
This could've gone a lot worse.
No one grasps the concept of the mask.
translation.zh: 没有人能理解这张面具的概念

translation.en: I just did 80 percent of your job.
translation.zh: 我完成了你八成的工作

translation.en: And that? That's how you repay me?
translation.zh: 而这个 就是你给我的回报？
38名纽约精英警员 对付一个穿紧身衣的人

translation.en: You don't have to wait up for me.
No, you most certainly will not.
Take off the damn hood and look at me.
Please go to sleep, Aunt May.
I can't sleep. Don't you understand? I can't sleep.
translation.zh: 我睡不着，你不明白吗？我睡不着
跨物种基因移植终于成功了

translation.en: I've used the lizard DNA to help Freddy regrow that limb.
translation.zh: 我用蜥蜴的DNA帮助弗雷迪重新长出了肢体

translation.en: No, it's hard work and promise.
translation.zh: 不，这是努力工作和承诺

translation.en: -It's a step closer to the primate lab. -He doesn't have time for every little step.
translation.zh: -这离灵长类动物实验又近了一步-他没有时间让你完成每一小步
一小步？ 我是说他不能再等了

translation.en: Unless he wants to be a lab rat.
You have to start human trials.
translation.zh: 你必须要开始人体实验

translation.en: -Now. -No, I don't, and no, I won't.
translation.zh: 马上开始 不，我绝不同意

translation.en: -Well, then he's going to die. -People die.
Where are you going to find the people to volunteer?
As far as anyone's concerned, it's for a flu shot.
translation.zh: 只要告诉他们是流感疫苗

translation.en: I might think the Veterans Hospital is a place to start.
translation.zh: 我觉得可以从退伍军人医院开始

translation.en: It's a little late for shock and indignation.
translation.zh: 现在觉得震惊和愤怒有点晚了

translation.en: I have no idea what you're talking about.
On you, it's a cheap suit, as it was then.
I had nothing to do with that.
Is that what you told his son?
translation.zh: 你就是这样告诉他儿子的？

translation.en: I don't know what you're saying.
You don't know, or you don't wanna know?
translation.zh: 你是不知道还是不想知道？
那我来提醒你当时发生了什么事

translation.en: Richard Parker said just about the same thing then that you are saying now.
translation.zh: 理查德·帕克曾经说过你现在所说的话

translation.en: The clock is ticking, Dr. Connors.
translation.zh: 时间不多了，康纳斯先生

translation.en: The formula is ours now anyway.
translation.zh: 反正配方现在是我们的了

translation.en: Say goodbye to that arm you have dreamed of.
translation.zh: 跟你所梦想的那条手臂说再见吧

translation.en: Have your office cleared out by the morning.
translation.zh: 明天早上之前清理你的办公室

translation.en: Your toys can be taken away too, you know.

translation.zh: 还好吗？ 你要去哪里？

translation.en: Maybe I got a rash or....
It's bad. Have you gone to the nurse?
translation.zh: 它挺严重，你去看护士了吗？

translation.en: No, no. I know. I know.
...you can come to this address at 8:00 tonight.
It's apartment 2016. I didn't write that part down.
translation.zh: 公寓号 是2016，我没有写下来

translation.en: How did you get out there?
-This is your room. -Yes, this is my room.
translation.zh: -这是你的房间-是的，这是我的房间

translation.en: No, it's impressive. They actually held together very well.
translation.zh: 不，很不错还很新鲜漂亮

translation.en: You have your suit in there?
It's for dinner. Are you gonna--?
-You must be Peter. -Dad, this is Peter.
translation.zh: 你一定是彼得 爸爸，这是彼得

translation.en: The car is taking him to the Veterans Hospital in Brooklyn.
translation.zh: 他正在坐车去布鲁克林的退伍军人医院

translation.en: You have to stop him. He--
I would, but I always lose him on the bridge.
translation.zh: 我可以但是我总会在桥上跟他失去联系

translation.en: I'll make sure Dr. Ratha returns your call as soon as possible.
translation.zh: 我会让拉达博士尽快回复你的电话

translation.en: I'm going to Holton Avenue, across the river. I'm in a hurry.
translation.zh: 我要到河对面的霍顿大街我在赶时间

translation.en: You want me to take the tunnel or the bridge?
translation.zh: 你是要走隧道还是大桥？

translation.en: Hey, you all right back there?

translation.zh: 你毒瘾发作了吗 伙计？

translation.en: The head goes on the other--
Help Gwen's friend with his fish.
-Tell us about your day. -Did you catch that spider guy yet?
translation.zh: -给我们说说今天的事吧-你们抓住了那个蜘蛛人吗？

translation.en: No, we didn't catch him yet.
But we will. He's an amateur...
translation.zh: 但是我们会抓住他，他是个

translation.en: ...who's assaulting civilians in the dead of night.
translation.zh: 在深夜袭击普通市民的外行人

translation.en: I mean, I saw that video...
...with him and the car thief, and....
translation.zh: 他和那个偷车贼的视频

translation.en: I think most people would say that he was...
translation.zh: 我觉得大多数人会认为他在...

translation.en: If I wanted the car thief off the street, he'd already be off the street.
translation.zh: 如果我想抓住那个偷车贼他早就落入法网了

translation.en: The car thief was leading us to the people who run the operation.
translation.zh: 那个偷车贼会指引我们找到
幕后首脑这是长达6个月的卧底行动

translation.en: It's called strategy. I'm sure you're aware of the term?
translation.zh: 这叫策略，我相信你知道这个词

translation.en: You've heard about that in school?

translation.zh: -你在学校里听过？-是的 那就好

translation.en: -He didn't know you had a plan. -You seem to know...
translation.zh: -显然他不知道你有计划-你好像

translation.en: ...a lot about this. Know something we don't?
translation.zh: 很了解你知道一些我们不知道的事吗？

translation.en: -Whose side are you on? -I'm not on anyone's side.
translation.zh: -你支持哪一方？-我哪一方都不支持

translation.en: -I saw a video on the Internet-- -You saw the video on the Internet.
translation.zh: 我在网上看到了一段视频... 你在网上看到了一段视频

translation.en: -Well, then the case is closed. -Well, no.
If you watch the video-- Maybe send you a link?
translation.zh: 如果你看了那段视频 也许我可以给你发条链接？

translation.en: It looks like he's trying to help.
translation.zh: 看上去他好像想提供帮助

translation.en: On the Internet he's being made out to look like a hero.
translation.zh: 在网上人们把他当成是英雄

translation.en: No, no. I'm not saying he's a hero.
translation.zh: 不 我不是说他是个英雄

translation.en: -What are you trying to say? -He's trying to help.
translation.zh: -那你想说什么？-我觉得他想提供帮助

translation.en: He's trying to do something the police can't.
translation.zh: 他想做一些警察办不到的事

translation.en: -I don't know. -What do you think we do?
translation.zh: -我不知道？-你觉得我们都在干什么？

translation.en: -...with our thumbs planted up our asses? -George.
He stands for what you stand for.
translation.zh: 我觉得他与你是同一战线

translation.en: Protecting innocent people from bad guys.
translation.zh: 保护无辜的人让他们不受坏人伤害

translation.en: I stand for law and order. That's what I stand for.
translation.zh: 我代表法律和秩序这是警察的意义

translation.en: This guy wears a mask like an outlaw.
translation.zh: 那个家伙戴着一张面具就像个歹徒

translation.en: He's hunting down criminals that all look the same...
translation.zh: 他在追捕一群长相相似的罪犯

translation.en: ...like he's got some sort of personal vendetta.
But he's not protecting innocent people, Mr. Parker.
translation.zh: 但他不是在保护无辜市民帕克先生
我们出去透透气吧，彼得

translation.en: -Dad, we need to talk. -Yes, we do.

translation.zh: 谢谢你邀请我来，非常抱歉

translation.en: I'm sorry if I insulted you. It was not my intention.
translation.zh: 谢谢你邀请我来，非常抱歉 如果我冒犯了你，那不是我的本意

translation.en: -You're welcome. -Branzino was real good, Mrs. Stacy.
translation.zh: -不用客气-鲈鱼很好吃，斯泰西夫人

translation.en: I'm sorry. I thought he was going to arrest me at one point.
translation.zh: 非常抱歉我还以为他要逮捕我

translation.en: No, I wouldn't have let him arrest you.
-What happened to your face? -I wanna tell you something.
translation.zh: -你的脸怎么了？-我要告诉你一些事情

translation.en: Okay, okay, okay. I gotta tell you this one thing.
translation.zh: 好的，有件事我要告诉你

translation.en: I gotta tell you this one thing about the vigilante and the car thief.
translation.zh: 这件事 -与义务警员和偷车贼有关-好的
-与义务警员和偷车贼有关-好的 什么？

translation.en: -No, no, no. -I don't want to talk about that.
Forget that. I won't talk about that.
-I'm gonna talk about me, okay? -What about you?
translation.zh: -我要谈谈关于我的事，好吗？-你怎么了？

translation.en: It's impo-- I wish I could just--
translation.zh: 这很重要，我希望我可以...

translation.en: I can't. It's hard to say.
Your father wants you to come inside.
Will you please find out what is going on, Alfred?
translation.zh: 可以去看看 发生了什么事吗，阿弗雷德？

translation.en: Somebody help! Help me! My kid is trapped!
translation.zh: 谁来帮帮忙 帮帮我，我的孩子被困住了

translation.en: Just a normal guy, all right?

translation.zh: 拿着我的面具 好的
你叫什么名字？ 杰克？
好的 好的，我救你出去

translation.en: Okay, look. I'll undo the belt.
translation.zh: 好的，听着 我要解开安全带，你要捉稳

translation.en: You hold on to that seat in front of you. On three?
translation.zh: 我要解开安全带，你要捉稳 前座，数到三好吗？

translation.en: See how easy that was? You did a great job.
translation.zh: 是不是很容易？你做得很好

translation.en: There you go. That's it. That's it, buddy.
Do me a favor. A little faster, okay, bud?
translation.zh: 帮帮忙 动作快点，好吗，伙计？

translation.en: You're doing great, buddy. You're doing great.
translation.zh: 你做得很好，伙计你做得非常棒

translation.en: ...9 p.m. last night, an incident took place on the Williamsburg Bridge.
translation.zh: 昨晚九点左右在威廉斯堡大桥发生了一起事故

translation.en: Much of what occurred is speculation at this point.
translation.zh: 到底发生了什么事 到目前还只是猜测但是这桩案件的几个目击者

translation.en: However, several eyewitnesses to the crime...
translation.zh: 到目前还只是猜测但是这桩案件的几个目击者

translation.en: ...as well as our own preliminary findings...
...have positively placed one individual at the scene.
translation.zh: 都确认 有个人出现在现场

translation.en: ...for the masked vigilante known as Spider-Man.
translation.zh: 以缉拿名叫蜘蛛侠的义务警员

translation.en: And lastly, city council members met with homeowners and airport officials...
translation.zh: 最后，市议会成员与机场工作人员
在前面的四个小时会议里...
还有谁知道这件事？ 只有你

translation.en: You don't believe what the police are saying, do you?
translation.zh: 你不相信警方的说法，是吗？

translation.en: What did that thing on the bridge look like?
translation.zh: 大桥上的那东西长什么样子？

translation.en: It was real big. Too big to be human.
Whatever was attacking them would have killed them.
translation.zh: 攻击他们的东西可能会杀了他们

translation.en: So I gotta go after it.
translation.zh: 所以... 我必须捉拿它

translation.en: It was good for me too.
I gave everyone the week off.
No, I got a free track.
I wanted to ask you a question.
How would a predator track a reptile?
translation.zh: 一只食肉动物 该怎样追踪一只爬行动物？
它们不会，大多数爬行动物

translation.en: Most reptiles are at the top of their respective food chain.
translation.zh: 它们不会，大多数爬行动物 都在其食物链的顶端
它们是自己领域里的王者

translation.en: Why the sudden interest in the cold-blooded?
translation.zh: 为什么突然对冷血动物感兴趣了？

translation.en: So because of the cold blood...
...would they react to changes in temperatures?
translation.zh: 会不会对温度变化作出反应？

translation.en: You'd have to catch one first.
Did you know there's a rumor of a new species in New York?
translation.zh: 据说纽约出现了一个新物种

translation.en: What do you know about it? You seen it?
translation.zh: 你对它有什么了解？你见过它吗？

translation.en: Never been better, Peter. Never been better.
Afraid I have to ask you to leave.
translation.zh: 你得离开了我正在研究

translation.en: I have a new project I'm working on. I need to be alone.
translation.zh: 你得离开了我正在研究 一个新项目，我不想被其他人打扰

translation.en: Don't worry, Mr. Parker. I'll be back.
translation.zh: 不用担心，帕克先生，我会回来

translation.en: Mr. Mayor, if there was a giant dinosaur running around...
translation.zh: 市长先生，如果有一只恐龙 在到处跑，你将会第一个知道

translation.en: ...you would be the first to know.
translation.zh: 在到处跑，你将会第一个知道

translation.en: So tell your son he can rest easy, all right?
translation.zh: 叫你的儿子不用担心，好吗？

translation.en: Yeah. You and me both, sir.
-Mr. Parker, why are you not in school? -Got a free track.
translation.zh: 帕克先生，为什么 -你不在上学？-今天没课

translation.en: Fine, there may not be a dinosaur running around.
translation.zh: 好的，市里也许没有恐龙在到处跑

translation.en: There is something more dangerous, and I know who.
translation.zh: 但是市里有更危险的东西我知道是谁
-你知道是谁？-科特·康纳斯博士
-他是个生物化学家-奥斯公司的博士？

translation.en: ...who's my daughter's mentor. Is that who?
Recently, Dr. Connors gave Gwen a glowing college recommendation.
translation.zh: 最近，康纳斯博士给了格温一封大学推荐信

translation.en: It was beautiful. When I read it, I cried.
translation.zh: 写得非常漂亮我读的时候都流眼泪了

translation.en: ...that he is running around dressed up like a dinosaur?
translation.zh: 你想让我相信 他装扮成恐龙的模样到处跑？

translation.en: Not dressing up and not a dinosaur. He has transformed himself into a lizard.
translation.zh: 不是装扮，也不是恐龙他让自己变成了一只大蜥蜴

translation.en: Let me ask you a question.
Do I look like the mayor of Tokyo to you?
translation.zh: 我看起来像东京的市长吗？

translation.en: I'm telling you the absolute truth.
This man has worked for his whole life on cross-species genetics.
translation.zh: 这个人一生都在研究跨物种基因移植

translation.en: He lost an arm, he tried to grow it back, but the equation was imbalanced.
translation.zh: 他失去了一条手臂，他想让它重新长回来，但是公式不平衡

translation.en: He has turned into a lizard. He's using lizard DNA.
translation.zh: 他用蜥蜴的DNA变成了蜥蜴

translation.en: He is dangerous, and he is planning something horrific. I know. I know.
translation.zh: 他很危险他在策划一些可怕的事情，我知道

translation.en: Okay. All right, I get it.
You'll go back to hanging out with the citizens of Tokyo.
translation.zh: 你回去和东京市民待在一起

translation.en: I'm gonna go back to protecting the citizens of this fine, fair city of ours.
translation.zh: 我回去保护 我们这个美丽城市的市民

translation.en: Sergeant Butler, please escort Mr. Parker back to school.
translation.zh: 巴特勒警官，请送帕克先生 -回学校-斯泰西警长，我不是在胡闹

translation.en: Captain Stacy, I'm not messing around.
translation.zh: -回学校-斯泰西警长，我不是在胡闹

translation.en: Just bring him in. Just call him in. You have to call him in.
translation.zh: 把他带到警局，你要叫他过来

translation.en: He is a danger to everybody.
translation.zh: 他对大家来说是个威胁

translation.en: Get me everything we have on Dr. Curtis Connors.
translation.zh: 把关于科特·康纳斯博士所有的资料都交给我
实验对象，科特·康纳斯博士

translation.en: Blood panels reveal lymphocyte and monocyte readings...
translation.zh: 血液测试显示淋巴细胞和单核白细胞读数
与实验对象过去的一致

translation.en: Subject no longer requires corrective lenses.
translation.zh: 实验对象不再需要戴矫正眼镜

translation.en: This is no longer about curing ills.
In attempt to redress regenerative relapse...
Also, my father is under the impression...
You should see the other guy.
The other guy, in this instance, being a giant mutant lizard.
translation.zh: 那个人，在这个情况下是一只变异大蜥蜴

translation.en: Do you want cocoa? Howard's making some.
translation.zh: 你要喝可可吗？ 霍华德在做可可

translation.en: No, Dad, I do not want cocoa.

translation.zh: 说真的，我17岁了 好吧

translation.en: I remembered somebody saying her fantasy was to live in a chocolate house.
translation.zh: 我记得有人说她的梦想就是住在巧克力屋里

translation.en: I can't have cocoa right now because I'm work--
translation.zh: 我现在不能喝可可，因为我在...

translation.en: I feel kind of pukey and just sort of....
-Like, emotional. I keep crying. -It's okay. Good.
I'm going to be all right.
Every day, for as long as I can remember...

translation.zh: 从我记事起，我父亲 每天早上出去时

translation.en: ...and he's put a badge on his chest...
...and strapped a gun to his hip.
And every day, for as long as I can remember...
...I haven't known if he was gonna make it home.
translation.zh: 我都不知道他是否可以回家

translation.en: I have to, because I created him.
translation.zh: 我必须这样，因为是我制造了他

translation.en: Something my father had been working on, you know.
translation.zh: 我父亲以前研究的东西

translation.en: Secretly. Now I realize why he kept it a secret.
translation.zh: 秘密地研究现在我明白他为何要保守秘密

translation.en: Point is, this is my responsibility.
Let's just get out of here.
Just for a minute. Can we?
If my parents see me leaving, I'm dead.
translation.zh: 如果我的父母看到我离开我就死定了

translation.en: Your parents aren't gonna see you leaving.
translation.zh: 你的父母不会看到你离开

translation.en: I'm not the one who needs help.
translation.zh: 需要帮助的 不是我

translation.en: There will be no more loneliness...
...could enhance humanity on an evolutionary scale.
translation.zh: 物种范围内的散布 可以让人类得以进化

translation.en: One has to adapt to survive.
"That, changing like the snake, I might be free...
translation.zh: 〝像蛇一样蜕变，我可能会获得自由

translation.en: ...to cast off flesh wherein I dwell confined."
translation.zh: 舍弃束缚我的血肉之躯〞

translation.en: Would you give it all up...
translation.zh: 你在你知道自己的能力之后

translation.en: ...after all you know you can do?
translation.zh: 你在你知道自己的能力之后 你舍得放弃吗？

translation.en: You're not gonna get in the way of my plan, Peter Parker!
translation.zh: 你不能阻止 我的计划 彼得·帕克

translation.en: I can save them. I can cure them.
translation.zh: 我可以拯救他们 我可以治好他们

translation.en: There's no need to stop me, Peter.
translation.zh: 没有必要阻止我 彼得

translation.en: -I'm gonna throw you out the window. -What?
translation.zh: -我要把你从窗户扔出去-什么？

translation.en: This is Lieutenant Williams... ...from the New York City Police Department.
translation.zh: 我是纽约警局的威廉斯中尉

translation.en: I'm fine. I'm okay. I'm in the sewer, tracking him.
translation.zh: 我没事 我在下水道里追踪他我要趁他还没伤人前阻止他

translation.en: I gotta stop him before anyone gets hurt.
translation.zh: 我在下水道里追踪他我要趁他还没伤人前阻止他

translation.en: -Do you know how to run a serum? -I do it all the time.
translation.zh: -你知道如何准备血清吗？-我经常做

translation.en: Okay, great. Okay, I need you to go to Oscorp.
translation.zh: 很好，我要你到奥斯公司

translation.en: I need you to access the cross-species file. It's a blue serum.
translation.zh: 读取跨物种文件是一剂蓝色血清

translation.en: I spent my life as a scientist trying to create a world without weakness...
translation.zh: 我作为科学家用尽一生来创造没有弱点

translation.en: I sought to create a stronger human being...
translation.zh: 我力求创造更强的人类

translation.en: Human beings are weak, pathetic, feeble-minded creatures.
translation.zh: 人类是弱小、可悲、懦弱 的生物
我们为什么还要做人类？

translation.en: ...when we can be so much more?
translation.zh: 我们可以 变得更强

translation.en: This is my gift to you.
We have a confirmed sighting, sir. The Lizard's headed toward Canal Street.
translation.zh: 我们有发现，长官蜥蜴正前往 -运河街-蜘蛛侠呢？
-运河街-蜘蛛侠呢？ 他在那所高中里

translation.en: I want that Spider-Man off the street.
The lizard creature has released a biological agent.
translation.zh: 蜥蜴人释放了一种生物药剂

translation.en: All efforts to stop him have failed...
translation.zh: 所有阻止他的行动都失败了

translation.en: ...and he is now proceeding north on 7th Avenue. Over.
translation.zh: 他目前沿着第七大道往北移动通话完毕

translation.en: You have to get out of there now.
Connors is on the way. He's coming to you right now.
translation.zh: 康纳斯正赶向那里他正在朝你那边走

translation.en: He needs the device. He's gonna infect the whole city!
translation.zh: 他要用那台装置感染整个城市的人

translation.en: You're gonna wait eight minutes after what I told you?
translation.zh: 听了我刚刚说的话你还要等八分钟？

translation.en: Gwen! Gwen! You Mother Hubbard. Are you serious?
translation.zh: 格温，可恶，你是认真的吗？

translation.en: Stand down now, or we will open fire.
translation.zh: 马上停下来，否则我们就会开火

translation.en: You are surrounded. There is no escape.
translation.zh: 你被包围了 你逃不了

translation.en: And your daughter's there right now.
Well, Paul, if I didn't see it, I wouldn't believe it.
translation.zh: 保罗，如果不是亲眼看到我肯定不会相信

translation.en: I won't venture to say what it is crawling up...
...the north side of the Oscorp Tower...
translation.zh: 奥斯公司大厦背面是什么东西

translation.en: ...but clearly it is not human and it is very, very strong.
translation.zh: 但显然它不是人类而且它非常强壮

translation.en: We're getting the latest details. This is just coming in.
translation.zh: 我们刚刚收到了最新消息
启动了城市范围内的疏散

translation.en: If you are south of 54th Street...
...you have to move out of the area immediately.
Spider-Man appears to be heading towards Oscorp.
translation.zh: 蜘蛛人似乎正在赶往奥斯公司

translation.en: ...and it's really not clear if he's gonna make it.

translation.zh: 在大桥上救了我的孩子
特洛伊，他们要让我们离开

translation.en: Something bad's going down in Midtown.
translation.zh: 市中心发生了糟糕的事

translation.en: Still friends with Matthews, that crane operator on 6th?
translation.zh: 你和第六大道的那个起重机司机马修斯还是朋友吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Get him on the phone for me.
Get him on the phone for me.
Hey, Charlie, get me Enriquez on 54th Street!
translation.zh: 查理，给我联系54街的恩里克斯

translation.en: -You got it. -Angelo, get your mug over here.

translation.zh: 第六大道的所有起重机

translation.en: ...swing your jib arms over the avenue. Boom angles at 90 degrees.
translation.zh: 让铁臂横架于大道之上支臂角度为90度

translation.en: Spider-Man needs those big boys high and lined up.
translation.zh: 蜘蛛侠需要它们高高排列一起

translation.en: Let's give him a clear approach. Over.
translation.zh: 我们给他一条通道，通话完毕

translation.en: -I have to get this to Spider-Man. -Get in.
translation.zh: -我要把这个交给蜘蛛侠-上车

translation.en: -It can stop the Lizard. -Get in the car.
Your boyfriend is a man of many masks.

translation.zh: 嘿 格温给你的礼物
没事了 我们阻止了他

translation.en: -Okay. -Let's get you out of here. Come on.
translation.zh: 好的 我们离开这里，来吧

translation.en: Look at me. Stay with me.
-Help's on the way, okay? -You need to....
You need to be gone when they get here.
translation.zh: 你要在他们赶到之前离开

translation.en: I was wrong about you, Peter.
Sometimes the people closest to you.
So I want you to promise me something, okay?
translation.zh: 所以我要你答应我一件事，好吗？

translation.en: An eerie calm has set in over New York City.
translation.zh: 一种怪异的宁静 笼罩着纽约市

translation.en: Apparently, some sort of aerosolized antidote...
translation.zh: 显然某种 雾化解药从奥斯公司大厦
雾化解药从奥斯公司大厦 发射了它似乎抵消了生物毒素

translation.en: ...which seems to have counteracted the biotoxins.
translation.zh: 发射了它似乎抵消了生物毒素

translation.en: Residents of Lower Manhattan can rest peacefully...
translation.zh: 曼哈顿下城的居民可以放心了

translation.en: ...knowing that the alleged mastermind of this terror plot...
translation.zh: 因为这次恐怖阴谋的策划人 科特·康纳斯博士已经被捕
科特·康纳斯博士已经被捕

translation.en: ...on the street for a report in Lower Manhattan.
translation.zh: 在曼哈顿下城的为我们报道

translation.en: Two of my teachers showed up.
translation.zh: 我的两个老师出席了葬礼

translation.en: Can't do this. Can't do this.
He made you promise, didn't he?
translation.zh: 他让你作出承诺了，是吗？

translation.en: To stay away from me, so I'd be safe.
I'm just no good for her.
Peter Parker, if there's one thing you are, it's good.
translation.zh: 彼得·帕克，如果你只有一样东西那就是好

translation.en: Anyone has a problem with that can talk to me.
translation.zh: 如果谁不同意这点 叫他们跟我谈谈

translation.en: Peter, I know things have been difficult lately...
translation.zh: 彼得，我知道 最近很不如意

translation.en: I think I know what you're feeling.
Ever since you were a little boy...
...you've been living with so many unresolved things.
translation.zh: 你就要面对很多悬而未决的事情

translation.en: Well, take it from an old man:
Those things send us down a road.
translation.zh: 这些事情决定我们要走的路

translation.en: They make us who we are.
And if anyone's destined for greatness, it's you, son.
translation.zh: 如果有人会注定做大事那就是你，孩子

translation.en: You owe the world your gifts.
You just have to figure out how to use them.
translation.zh: 你只需知道如何使用它们

translation.en: And know that wherever they take you...
Come on, guys, you heard the bell. Get to class.
translation.zh: 快点，伙计们，铃响了，去上课吧

translation.en: I had a professor once who liked to tell his students...
translation.zh: 我有一位教授喜欢告诉他的学生

translation.en: ...that there were only 10 different plots in all of fiction.
translation.zh: 所有的小说都只有十种情节

translation.en: Well, I'm here to tell you he was wrong.
translation.zh: 我现在告诉你们，他说错了

translation.en: At least we can always count on you.
Sorry, Miss Ritter, won't happen again, I promise.
translation.zh: 抱歉，瑞特女士我不会再迟到了，我保证

translation.en: Don't make promises you can't keep.
Yeah, but those are the best kind.
translation.zh: 但是那种承诺是最棒的

translation.en: Did you tell the boy the truth about his father?
translation.zh: 你告诉那孩子关于他爸爸的真相了吗？

translation.en: So we'll let him be for now.
translation.zh: 那我们现在... 会放过他
